00017 static void ECDSA_TestInstantiations()
00018 {
00019         ECDSA<EC2N>::Signer t1;
00020         ECDSA<EC2N>::Verifier t2(t1);
00021         ECNR<ECP>::Signer t3;
00022         ECNR<ECP>::Verifier t4(t3);
00023         ECIES<ECP>::Encryptor t5;
00024         ECIES<EC2N>::Decryptor t6;
00025         ECDH<ECP>::Domain t7;
00026         ECMQV<ECP>::Domain t8;
00027 }
00028 #endif

00030 // VC60 workaround: complains when these functions are put into an anonymous namespace
00031 static Integer ConvertToInteger(const PolynomialMod2 &x)
00032 {
00033         unsigned int l = x.ByteCount();
00034         SecByteBlock temp(l);
00035         x.Encode(temp, l);
00036         return Integer(temp, l);
00037 }
00038 
00039 static inline Integer ConvertToInteger(const Integer &x)
00040 {
00041         return x;
00042 }
00043 
00044 static bool CheckMOVCondition(const Integer &q, const Integer &r)
00045 {
00046         // see "Updated standards for validating elliptic curves", http://eprint.iacr.org/2007/343
00047         Integer t = 1;
00048         unsigned int n = q.IsEven() ? 1 : q.BitCount(), m = r.BitCount();
00049 
00050         for (unsigned int i=n; DiscreteLogWorkFactor(i)<m/2; i+=n)
00051         {
00052                 if (q.IsEven())
00053                         t = (t+t)%r;
00054                 else
00055                         t = (t*q)%r;
00056                 if (t == 1)
00057                         return false;
00058         }
00059         return true;
00060 }

00062 // ******************************************************************
00063 
00064 template <class T> struct EcRecommendedParameters;
00065 
00066 template<> struct EcRecommendedParameters<EC2N>
00067 {
00068         EcRecommendedParameters(const OID &oid, unsigned int t2, unsigned int t3, unsigned int t4, const char *a, const char *b, const char *g, const char *n, unsigned int h)
00069                 : oid(oid), t0(0), t1(0), t2(t2), t3(t3), t4(t4), a(a), b(b), g(g), n(n), h(h) {}
00070         EcRecommendedParameters(const OID &oid, unsigned int t0, unsigned int t1, unsigned int t2, unsigned int t3, unsigned int t4, const char *a, const char *b, const char *g, const char *n, unsigned int h)
00071                 : oid(oid), t0(t0), t1(t1), t2(t2), t3(t3), t4(t4), a(a), b(b), g(g), n(n), h(h) {}
00072         EC2N *NewEC() const
00073         {
00074                 StringSource ssA(a, true, new HexDecoder);
00075                 StringSource ssB(b, true, new HexDecoder);
00076                 if (t0 == 0)
00077                         return new EC2N(GF2NT(t2, t3, t4), EC2N::FieldElement(ssA, (size_t)ssA.MaxRetrievable()), EC2N::FieldElement(ssB, (size_t)ssB.MaxRetrievable()));
00078                 else
00079                         return new EC2N(GF2NPP(t0, t1, t2, t3, t4), EC2N::FieldElement(ssA, (size_t)ssA.MaxRetrievable()), EC2N::FieldElement(ssB, (size_t)ssB.MaxRetrievable()));
00080         };
00081 
00082         OID oid;
00083         unsigned int t0, t1, t2, t3, t4;
00084         const char *a, *b, *g, *n;
00085         unsigned int h;
00086 };
00087 
00088 template<> struct EcRecommendedParameters<ECP>
00089 {
00090         EcRecommendedParameters(const OID &oid, const char *p, const char *a, const char *b, const char *g, const char *n, unsigned int h)
00091                 : oid(oid), p(p), a(a), b(b), g(g), n(n), h(h) {}
00092         ECP *NewEC() const
00093         {
00094                 StringSource ssP(p, true, new HexDecoder);
00095                 StringSource ssA(a, true, new HexDecoder);
00096                 StringSource ssB(b, true, new HexDecoder);
00097                 return new ECP(Integer(ssP, (size_t)ssP.MaxRetrievable()), ECP::FieldElement(ssA, (size_t)ssA.MaxRetrievable()), ECP::FieldElement(ssB, (size_t)ssB.MaxRetrievable()));
00098         };
00099 
00100         OID oid;
00101         const char *p;
00102         const char *a, *b, *g, *n;
00103         unsigned int h;
00104 };
00105 
00106 struct OIDLessThan
00107 {
00108         template <typename T>
00109         inline bool operator()(const EcRecommendedParameters<T>& a, const OID& b) {return a.oid < b;}
00110         template <typename T>
00111         inline bool operator()(const OID& a, const EcRecommendedParameters<T>& b) {return a < b.oid;}
00112         template <typename T>
00113         inline bool operator()(const EcRecommendedParameters<T>& a, const EcRecommendedParameters<T>& b) {return a.oid < b.oid;}
00114 };

00413 
00414 template <class EC> OID DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::GetNextRecommendedParametersOID(const OID &oid)
00415 {
00416         const EcRecommendedParameters<EllipticCurve> *begin, *end;
00417         GetRecommendedParameters(begin, end);
00418         const EcRecommendedParameters<EllipticCurve> *it = std::upper_bound(begin, end, oid, OIDLessThan());
00419         return (it == end ? OID() : it->oid);
00420 }
00421 
00422 template <class EC> void DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::Initialize(const OID &oid)
00423 {
00424         const EcRecommendedParameters<EllipticCurve> *begin, *end;
00425         GetRecommendedParameters(begin, end);
00426         const EcRecommendedParameters<EllipticCurve> *it = std::lower_bound(begin, end, oid, OIDLessThan());
00427         if (it == end || it->oid != oid)
00428                 throw UnknownOID();
00429 
00430         const EcRecommendedParameters<EllipticCurve> &param = *it;
00431         m_oid = oid;
00432         std::auto_ptr<EllipticCurve> ec(param.NewEC());
00433         this->m_groupPrecomputation.SetCurve(*ec);
00434 
00435         StringSource ssG(param.g, true, new HexDecoder);
00436         Element G;
00437         bool result = GetCurve().DecodePoint(G, ssG, (size_t)ssG.MaxRetrievable());
00438         SetSubgroupGenerator(G);
00439         assert(result);
00440 
00441         StringSource ssN(param.n, true, new HexDecoder);
00442         m_n.Decode(ssN, (size_t)ssN.MaxRetrievable());
00443         m_k = param.h;
00444 }
00445 
00446 template <class EC>
00447 bool DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::GetVoidValue(const char *name, const std::type_info &valueType, void *pValue) const
00448 {
00449         if (strcmp(name, Name::GroupOID()) == 0)
00450         {
00451                 if (m_oid.m_values.empty())
00452                         return false;
00453 
00454                 this->ThrowIfTypeMismatch(name, typeid(OID), valueType);
00455                 *reinterpret_cast<OID *>(pValue) = m_oid;
00456                 return true;
00457         }
00458         else
00459                 return GetValueHelper<DL_GroupParameters<Element> >(this, name, valueType, pValue).Assignable()
00460                         CRYPTOPP_GET_FUNCTION_ENTRY(Curve);
00461 }
00462 
00463 template <class EC>
00464 void DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::AssignFrom(const NameValuePairs &source)
00465 {
00466         OID oid;
00467         if (source.GetValue(Name::GroupOID(), oid))
00468                 Initialize(oid);
00469         else
00470         {
00471                 EllipticCurve ec;
00472                 Point G;
00473                 Integer n;
00474 
00475                 source.GetRequiredParameter("DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>", Name::Curve(), ec);
00476                 source.GetRequiredParameter("DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>", Name::SubgroupGenerator(), G);
00477                 source.GetRequiredParameter("DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>", Name::SubgroupOrder(), n);
00478                 Integer k = source.GetValueWithDefault(Name::Cofactor(), Integer::Zero());
00479 
00480                 Initialize(ec, G, n, k);
00481         }
00482 }
00483 
00484 template <class EC>
00485 void DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::GenerateRandom(RandomNumberGenerator &rng, const NameValuePairs &alg)
00486 {
00487         try
00488         {
00489                 AssignFrom(alg);
00490         }
00491         catch (InvalidArgument &)
00492         {
00493                 throw NotImplemented("DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>: curve generation is not implemented yet");
00494         }
00495 }
00496 
00497 template <class EC>
00498 void DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::BERDecode(BufferedTransformation &bt)
00499 {
00500         byte b;
00501         if (!bt.Peek(b))
00502                 BERDecodeError();
00503         if (b == OBJECT_IDENTIFIER)
00504                 Initialize(OID(bt));
00505         else
00506         {
00507                 BERSequenceDecoder seq(bt);
00508                         word32 version;
00509                         BERDecodeUnsigned<word32>(seq, version, INTEGER, 1, 1); // check version
00510                         EllipticCurve ec(seq);
00511                         Point G = ec.BERDecodePoint(seq);
00512                         Integer n(seq);
00513                         Integer k;
00514                         bool cofactorPresent = !seq.EndReached();
00515                         if (cofactorPresent)
00516                                 k.BERDecode(seq);
00517                         else
00518                                 k = Integer::Zero();
00519                 seq.MessageEnd();
00520 
00521                 Initialize(ec, G, n, k);
00522         }
00523 }
00524 
00525 template <class EC>
00526 void DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::DEREncode(BufferedTransformation &bt) const
00527 {
00528         if (m_encodeAsOID && !m_oid.m_values.empty())
00529                 m_oid.DEREncode(bt);
00530         else
00531         {
00532                 DERSequenceEncoder seq(bt);
00533                 DEREncodeUnsigned<word32>(seq, 1);      // version
00534                 GetCurve().DEREncode(seq);
00535                 GetCurve().DEREncodePoint(seq, this->GetSubgroupGenerator(), m_compress);
00536                 m_n.DEREncode(seq);
00537                 if (m_k.NotZero())
00538                         m_k.DEREncode(seq);
00539                 seq.MessageEnd();
00540         }
00541 }
00542 
00543 template <class EC>
00544 Integer DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::GetCofactor() const
00545 {
00546         if (!m_k)
00547         {
00548                 Integer q = GetCurve().FieldSize();
00549                 Integer qSqrt = q.SquareRoot();
00550                 m_k = (q+2*qSqrt+1)/m_n;
00551         }
00552 
00553         return m_k;
00554 }
00555 
00556 template <class EC>
00557 Integer DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::ConvertElementToInteger(const Element &element) const
00558 {
00559         return ConvertToInteger(element.x);
00560 };
00561 
00562 template <class EC>
00563 bool DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::ValidateGroup(RandomNumberGenerator &rng, unsigned int level) const
00564 {
00565         bool pass = GetCurve().ValidateParameters(rng, level);
00566 
00567         Integer q = GetCurve().FieldSize();
00568         pass = pass && m_n!=q;
00569 
00570         if (level >= 2)
00571         {
00572                 Integer qSqrt = q.SquareRoot();
00573                 pass = pass && m_n>4*qSqrt;
00574                 pass = pass && VerifyPrime(rng, m_n, level-2);
00575                 pass = pass && (m_k.IsZero() || m_k == (q+2*qSqrt+1)/m_n);
00576                 pass = pass && CheckMOVCondition(q, m_n);
00577         }
00578 
00579         return pass;
00580 }
00581 
00582 template <class EC>
00583 bool DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::ValidateElement(unsigned int level, const Element &g, const DL_FixedBasePrecomputation<Element> *gpc) const
00584 {
00585         bool pass = !IsIdentity(g) && GetCurve().VerifyPoint(g);
00586         if (level >= 1)
00587         {
00588                 if (gpc)
00589                         pass = pass && gpc->Exponentiate(this->GetGroupPrecomputation(), Integer::One()) == g;
00590         }
00591         if (level >= 2 && pass)
00592         {
00593                 const Integer &q = GetSubgroupOrder();
00594                 Element gq = gpc ? gpc->Exponentiate(this->GetGroupPrecomputation(), q) : ExponentiateElement(g, q);
00595                 pass = pass && IsIdentity(gq);
00596         }
00597         return pass;
00598 }
00599 
00600 template <class EC>
00601 void DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::SimultaneousExponentiate(Element *results, const Element &base, const Integer *exponents, unsigned int exponentsCount) const
00602 {
00603         GetCurve().SimultaneousMultiply(results, base, exponents, exponentsCount);
00604 }
00605 
00606 template <class EC>
00607 CPP_TYPENAME DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::Element DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::MultiplyElements(const Element &a, const Element &b) const
00608 {
00609         return GetCurve().Add(a, b);
00610 }
00611 
00612 template <class EC>
00613 CPP_TYPENAME DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::Element DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::CascadeExponentiate(const Element &element1, const Integer &exponent1, const Element &element2, const Integer &exponent2) const
00614 {
00615         return GetCurve().CascadeMultiply(exponent1, element1, exponent2, element2);
00616 }

00618 template <class EC>
00619 OID DL_GroupParameters_EC<EC>::GetAlgorithmID() const
00620 {
00621         return ASN1::id_ecPublicKey();
00622 }

00626 template <class EC>
00627 void DL_PublicKey_EC<EC>::BERDecodePublicKey(BufferedTransformation &bt, bool parametersPresent, size_t size)
00628 {
00629         typename EC::Point P;
00630         if (!this->GetGroupParameters().GetCurve().DecodePoint(P, bt, size))
00631                 BERDecodeError();
00632         SetPublicElement(P);
00633 }
00634 
00635 template <class EC>
00636 void DL_PublicKey_EC<EC>::DEREncodePublicKey(BufferedTransformation &bt) const
00637 {
00638         this->GetGroupParameters().GetCurve().EncodePoint(bt, this->GetPublicElement(), this->GetGroupParameters().GetPointCompression());
00639 }
00640 
00641 // ******************************************************************
00642 
00643 template <class EC>
00644 void DL_PrivateKey_EC<EC>::BERDecodePrivateKey(BufferedTransformation &bt, bool parametersPresent, size_t size)
00645 {
00646         BERSequenceDecoder seq(bt);
00647                 word32 version;
00648                 BERDecodeUnsigned<word32>(seq, version, INTEGER, 1, 1); // check version
00649 
00650                 BERGeneralDecoder dec(seq, OCTET_STRING);
00651                 if (!dec.IsDefiniteLength())
00652                         BERDecodeError();
00653                 Integer x;
00654                 x.Decode(dec, (size_t)dec.RemainingLength());
00655                 dec.MessageEnd();
00656                 if (!parametersPresent && seq.PeekByte() != (CONTEXT_SPECIFIC | CONSTRUCTED | 0))
00657                         BERDecodeError();
00658                 if (!seq.EndReached() && seq.PeekByte() == (CONTEXT_SPECIFIC | CONSTRUCTED | 0))
00659                 {
00660                         BERGeneralDecoder parameters(seq, CONTEXT_SPECIFIC | CONSTRUCTED | 0);
00661                         this->AccessGroupParameters().BERDecode(parameters);
00662                         parameters.MessageEnd();
00663                 }
00664                 if (!seq.EndReached())
00665                 {
00666                         // skip over the public element
00667                         SecByteBlock subjectPublicKey;
00668                         unsigned int unusedBits;
00669                         BERGeneralDecoder publicKey(seq, CONTEXT_SPECIFIC | CONSTRUCTED | 1);
00670                         BERDecodeBitString(publicKey, subjectPublicKey, unusedBits);
00671                         publicKey.MessageEnd();
00672                         Element Q;
00673                         if (!(unusedBits == 0 && this->GetGroupParameters().GetCurve().DecodePoint(Q, subjectPublicKey, subjectPublicKey.size())))
00674                                 BERDecodeError();
00675                 }
00676         seq.MessageEnd();
00677 
00678         this->SetPrivateExponent(x);
00679 }
00680 
00681 template <class EC>
00682 void DL_PrivateKey_EC<EC>::DEREncodePrivateKey(BufferedTransformation &bt) const
00683 {
00684         DERSequenceEncoder privateKey(bt);
00685                 DEREncodeUnsigned<word32>(privateKey, 1);       // version
00686                 // SEC 1 ver 1.0 says privateKey (m_d) has the same length as order of the curve
00687                 // this will be changed to order of base point in a future version
00688                 this->GetPrivateExponent().DEREncodeAsOctetString(privateKey, this->GetGroupParameters().GetSubgroupOrder().ByteCount());
00689         privateKey.MessageEnd();
00690 }
